snippet.title: Nexoria: Dungeon Rogue Heroes (Early Access Trailer)
snippet.description:
NEXORIA — is a hardcore roguelike about dungeons with hybrid battles, combining classical turn based combat system and a collectible card game. Collect the best spells and conquer the dungeons!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/932210/Nexoria_Dungeon_Rogue_Heroes

Track:
"General Vibe - Miss Emeli" is under a Creative Commons license (CC BY 3.0)
Music promoted by BreakingCopyright: https://youtu.be/nbNeMkE7ks8
